mapper.select: SELECT a.mi_seq, a.mi_genre_seq, a.mi_title, a.mi_viewing_age, a.mi_opening_dt, b.mimg_file_name FROM movie_info a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM movie_image WHERE mimg_is_poster=1 GROUP BY mimg_mi_seq ) b ON a.mi_seq = b.mimg_mi_seq WHERE mi_showing_status = #{opening_status} ORDER BY mi_opening_dt DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT a.*,b.genre_name, c.mimg_file_name as poster_img FROM movie_info a LEFT outer join genre_info b ON a.mi_genre_seq = b.genre_seq LEFT outer join ( SELECT * FROM movie_image WHERE mimg_is_poster=1 GROUP BY mimg_mi_seq ) c ON a.mi_seq = c.mimg_mi_seq WHERE mi_seq = #{seq}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT msi_order AS n_order, msi_file_name AS content, 'img' AS type FROM movie_story_img WHERE msi_mi_seq = #{seq} UNION ALL SELECT mst_order AS n_order, mst_content AS content, 'text' AS type FROM movie_story_text WHERE mst_mi_seq = #{seq} )a ORDER BY n_order ASC

SELECT b.cai_seq , b.cai_name, c.cap_file_name, a.maci_casting_name, a.maci_role FROM movie_actor_casting_info a INNER JOIN cinema_actor_info b ON a.maci_cai_seq =b.cai_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN cinema_actor_photo c ON a.maci_cai_seq =c.cap_cai_seq WHERE maci_mi_seq = #{seq}
SELECT mimg_file_name FROM movie_image WHERE mimg_mi_seq = #{seq}
SELECT tvi_file_name FROM trailer_video_info WHERE tvi_mi_seq = #{seq}
SELECT mimg_file_name FROM movie_image WHERE mimg_mi_seq = #{seq} AND mimg_is_poster= 1 limit 1 order by mimg_seq asc
